WaveSoundBuffer.pan

Function/Meaning
Pan
Type
Property of the WaveSoundBuffer class (read/write)
Description
Represents the pan (sound image position). You can also set this value.
Specifies the left-right position where the sound is heard.
Specify a value from -100000 to 0 to 100000, where -100000 is fully left, 0 is center, and 100000 is fully right.
